captions.text: What's up everybody.
I'm Marc Merrill,
and I'm Brandon Beck.
When Marc and I started Riot we could've never imagined that the League of Legends community would evolve into what it's become today.
What started as a small but really devoted group of beta testers
has just exploded into a massive legion of dedicated fans.
And one of the coolest things that struck us most personally
is the sheer volume of unbelievably awesome fan creations that we recieve.
It's clear from these incredible submissions that our players don't just play the game,
they take an active role in creating their League of Legends experience.
By using their amazing creative talents to put their own personal touch,
on their favorite game.
The results of this passion are amazing.
With original art work that puts a unique twist
on the games most beloved and notorious characters.
Video highlights from the world of league of Legends.
Cosplay that brings the champions to life.
And a wide array of other artistic expressions,
demonstating their dedication to League of Legends.
League of Legends inspires its players.
And these players inspire each other to take part in an experience that is always changing,
always developing and always growing.
Our players also participate in themed competitions.
Submitting unbelievable creations, that show how deep their commitment to the game runs.
From League of Legends jack o lanterns, to valentines, even snowmen.
On behalf of all of us here at Riot Games, we'd like to thank the greatest gaming community in the world.
For your creativity, dedication and passion to our game.
Guys it's your enthusiasm that inspires us to bring our A game,
day in and day out to provide the best possible experience and keep making League of Legends better.
So thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thanks you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you!!!

comments.text:
You don't "need" much champions but dunno about maps, it's fun to have the 
option to play different maps and it's the same ofc with the champions. I 
also enjoy testing out the new champions, I'm not saying that they should 
stop or so, but give us some different game modes, I mean we have an ARAM 
map, we have a "Domination" map, we a 3v3 and 5v5 map and I'm actually 
hoping for some other kinds of game modes just for the fun I mean. I mean 1 
map to be tested with 110 champs or 1 champ on 4 maps?
